body:
> Please don't rewrite comments that people have replied to. It is very confusing.

Yes, sorry

> If you are using N versions, you'll need N copies so that go build can work. How can you get any fewer copies?

It is very simple. I only get the copies that I use **as user** (i.e. from another package of mine) but
I can develop on as much versions as I want inside a single working copy (via branches and tags).
For any new version I just change the canonical path and add a tag.
